languages.text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to damage from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their turn, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

languages.text: 装备者投掷手雷时，不会对自己与盟友造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。装备者每回合首次投掷{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}手雷{/g}时，都有50%的几率不消耗手雷。
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: 装备者投掷手雷时，不会对自己与盟友造成伤害。

languages.text: Дает персонажу и его союзникам иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g} от гранат персонажа. Применяя гранату в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, персонаж с шансом 50% не тратит эту гранату.
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to damage from the wearer's grenades.

traits.locale_text: Дает персонажу и его союзникам иммунитет к урону от гранат персонажа.
Дает персонажу и его союзникам иммунитет к урону от гранат персонажа.

languages.text: 使用者とその味方は、使用者が使うグレネードの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けない。自{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に使用者が初めてグレネードを使用するとき、50%の確率でグレネードは消費されない。
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: 自身とその味方が、自身が使用したグレネードでダメージを受けなくなる。

languages.text: El portador y sus aliados son inmunes al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de las granadas del portador. La primera vez que el portador use una granada en su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, hay un 50 % de probabilidad de no consumir la granada.
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: El portador y sus aliados son inmunes al daño de las granadas del portador.

languages.text: Der Träger und seine Verbündeten sind immun gegen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch Granaten des Trägers. Wenn der Träger in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} erstmals eine Granate einsetzt, hat er eine Chance von 50 %, diese nicht zu verbrauchen.
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger und seine Verbündeten sind immun gegen Schaden durch Granaten des Trägers.

languages.text: L'utilisateur et ses alliés sont invulnérables aux {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés par ses grenades. La première fois que l'utilisateur lance une grenade durant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, il bénéficie de 50 % de chances de ne pas dépenser la grenade.
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur et ses alliés sont invulnérables aux dégâts infligés par les grenades de celui-ci.

languages.text: Takan kişi ve dost birimleri, takan kişinin bombalarının verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} karşı bağışık olur. Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında ilk kez bomba kullandığında %50 olasılıkla bombayı harcamama olasılığına sahiptir.
languages.original_text: The wearer and their allies are immune to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from the wearer's grenades. The first time the wearer uses a grenade during their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, they have a 50% chance not to expend the grenade.
